title: Gotz-Warum hat Deutschland keinen Friedensvertrag(Reich still in
description:
For english-only speaking:
This booklet is in german language. English title would be: Why doesn't Germany have a peace agreement? Dr. Iwan GÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶tz goes back to history to uncover the political machinations in Germany after the end of 2nd World war that caused a permanent downfall of Germans as a nation. He stumbles upon mysterious contracts that were signed among the allies right after the war - all directed against the German Reich. But why would the all-powerful allied forces need such contracts in the first place? Wasn't the Reich completely defeated and laying in ruins? Furthermore, a divided and economically destroyed Germany couldn't possible represent a threat to the world. Is it possible that an element of the Reich survived the war and escaped the devastating allied embrace causing the allies to chase it in total secrecy possible? Why would the allies decide to "break up" and start a cold war amongst themselves? Was it perhaps to catch up in military technology with these mysterious Reichgermans? These and many other questions are being discussed in this fascinating booklet that no media will ever touch upon. 40 pages.
